::Dead-End::
Dead-End comes up from behind Speedbreaker. He swirves and 
slams on the breakes, side-swiping Speedbreaker out of the way, 
and preventing him from shooting. "Fool! We will terminate the pod 
only if it isn't Decepticon!" He transforms, leaping up into flight and 
stopped right over top of the pod, peering into it. "Speedbreaker 
and Wildrider, arm your weapons, but do NOT fire until my order." 
He shakes his head, and murmurs to himself, "Ha, with their 
intelligence, this pod'll probably end up as slag anyway..." He 
continues staring into the pod...


On 14 Apr 2001, at 0:19, gestalt_menasor@... wrote:

> Wildrider approaches the pod, and quickly shifts and transforms taking aim
> at it, and about to pull his trigger. Speedbreaker barrels into his legs
> however, sending the grey psychotic robot laughing maniacly into a rock.
> Speedbreaker then transforms, and takes aim himself at the pod, and is
> about to pull the trigger.
>
